integration.description: Customize your server with integrations. Manage webhooks, followed channels and apps, as well as Twitch and YouTube settings for creators.

webhooks.description: Webhooks are an easy way to get automated messages and data updates sent to text channel in the server using internet magic.

clanWebhooks.description: Clan Webhooks are a simple way to post messages from other apps and websites for each Mezon user using internet technology.
clanWebhooks.tips: Tip: If you feel the token on your URL is compromised or outdated, reset it and copy the new URL.

webhooksEdit.title: Webhooks Edit
webhooksEdit.recommendImage: We recommend an image of at least 128x128
webhooksEdit.deleteWebhookConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the {{webhookName}} webhook? This action cannot be undone.

webhooksEmpty.webhooksEmptyDes: For now, webhook can only be created on web or desktop

webhookChannelSelect.title: Select Channel
webhookChannelSelect.description: Choose a channel where you want to create the webhook
